hook_text: [VISUAL: A scowling dragon in a trench coat, clutching a magnifying glass over a graph. A chalk outline of a function is on the floor.] DIALOGUE: Case closed? Not until we nail its domain!

style_decision.reasoning: The 'Family Guy style' directly points to a cartoon aesthetic. Instagram's audience generally responds well to animated and visually dynamic content. Vibrant colors will enhance the comedic and engaging nature of the investigation, making the mathematical concepts more approachable and memorable.

positioning_decision.reasoning: For Instagram, avoiding the bottom 20% is crucial to prevent the overlay from being cut off or obscured by UI elements like the like/comment/share buttons, or the user's profile info. Placing it at the top center provides a clear viewing area for the content and the overlay title while remaining visible. It's a safe and effective placement for static text.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/calculus_dragon_ep13_20250728_021055/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='Domain Wheres it GO 🗺️':fontcolor=#54A0FF:fontsize=56:font='Verdana-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,6.5\,9.0),drawtext=text='Critical Points 🔥🚨':fontcolor=#FF6B6B:fontsize=60:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,9.5\,12.0),drawtext=text='Derivatives Moods 😈😇':fontcolor=#00D2D3:fontsize=58:font='Georgia-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,12.5\,15.5),drawtext=text='Concavity Curves 🎢':fontcolor=#5F27CD:fontsize=56:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,16.0\,18.5),drawtext=text='Inflection Points 💡':fontcolor=#96CEB4:fontsize=62:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,19.0\,21.5),drawtext=text='Asymptotes Invisible 👻':fontcolor=#C44569:fontsize=58:font='Helvetica-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,22.0\,25.0),drawtext=text='Sketching is FUN ✍️':fontcolor=#4ECDC4:fontsize=66:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,25.5\,28.5),drawtext=text='Math Case CLOSED 💯':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=70:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#5F27CD@1.0:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,29.0\,32.0),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=48:font='Montserrat-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FF00CC@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,27.85\,29.25),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=48:font='Montserrat-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FF00CC@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,29.35\,30.75) -c:a copy -y outputs/calculus_dragon_ep13_20250728_021055/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
